attributes.action: End the hostile Immigration environment by revising the cruel immigration act.
attributes.additional_details:
Figures released to the BBC showed the Home Office made £800m in revenue from fees in six years.
Windrush Scandal.
Home office are incompetent and also breach data protection as personal data is not safe with them.
attributes.background: The hostile environment is causing nothing but misery to families. Rising immigration fees, unrealistic thresholds, seperating loved ones showing lack of compassion and lack or empathy towards the citizens of the country. A system built by capitalists for the sake of profit at the expense of others.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what changes you would like the UK Government or Parliament to make to end the hostile environment.

You could start a new petition calling for Parliament to repeal the Immigration Acts 2014 and 2016 if that is something you would like to see happen.
